text: The 1st Kazakhstan President Cup was played from April 26 to April 30, 2008 in Almaty. 8 youth teams participated in the tournament (players were born no earlier than 1992.) == Participants == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !width=200| Team !width=30| Group !width=15| Result !width=80| Participation in a tournament !width=60| In a row !width=100| Last participation !width=150| The best result |- | ADO Den Haag || A||5th|| 1|| 1|| debut|| debut |- | Beşiktaş|| В||Winner|| 1|| 1|| debut|| debut |- | CSKA || A||2nd|| 1|| 1|| debut|| debut |- | Dinamo || B||7th|| 1|| 1|| debut|| debut |- | Ole Brasil|| A||4th|| 1|| 1|| debut|| debut |- | Spartak|| B||3rd|| 1|| 1|| debut|| debut |- | Tsesna|| A||8th|| 1|| 1|| debut|| debut |- | Zenit|| А||6th || 1|| 1|| debut|| debut |} == Venues == The match of opening and the final took place at the Central Stadium. Other matches took place at T.Ryskulov NEU Stadium. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !colspan="4" align="center"| Almaty |- |Central Stadium |- |Attendance: 23 804 |- | 250px !rowspan=8 colspan=2| |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !colspan="4" align="center"| Almaty |- |T.Ryskulov NEU Stadium |- |Attendance: 4 000 |- | 250px !rowspan=8 colspan=2| |} == Format == The tournament is held in two stages. At the first stage, eight teams are divided into two qualification groups (A and B). Competitions of the first stage were held on circular system. The winners of the groups advance to the final, while the group runners-up meet to determine third place. ==Group stage== All times UTC+6 ===Group A=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=175|Team !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| |- bgcolor=ccffcc |align="left"| CSKA |3||2||1||0||6||2||+4||7 |- |align="left"| Ole Brasil |3||2||0||1||5||4||+1||6 |- |align="left"| ADO Den Haag |3||1||0||2||4||7||−3||3 |- |align="left"| Tsesna |3||0||1||2||3||6||−3||1 |} \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group B=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=175|Team !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| |- bgcolor=ccffcc |align="left"| Beşiktaş |3||3||0||0||7||3||+4||9 |- |align="left"| Spartak |3||2||0||1||9||4||+5||6 |- |align="left"| Zenit |3||1||0||2||8||6||+2||3 |- |align="left"| Dinamo |3||0||0||3||1||11||−10||0 |} \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- == Match for the 7th place == == Match for the 5th place == == Bronze medal match == == Final == == Statistics == === Awards === *The best player of a tournament Andrew Arici (Ole Brasil) *Goalscorer of a tournament Alper Çakiroglu (Beşiktaş;5 goals) *The best goalkeeper of a tournament Lev Gorelik (Zenit) *The best defender of a tournament Ozmen Sezer (Beşiktaş) *The best midfielder of a tournament Petr Ten (CSKA) *The best forward of a tournament Thomas Verheijdt (ADO Den Haag) *Prize of spectator sympathies Alibek Sambiyev (Tsesna) === Prize money === According to FFK, the prize fund of a tournament will make 20,000 $. "The teams which took 1, 2 and 3 place will be received, respectively 10,000, 6,000 and 4,000 $. 2008 Category:2008 in Kazakhstani football Category:2007–08 in European football Category:2008 in Asian football Category:2008 in youth association football
title: 2008 Kazakhstan President Cup (football)
